title: What techniques can be used in hypnotherapy for personal growth and change?

last_phrase: In conclusion, the enneagram can serve as a helpful tool for understanding our compulsive behaviors and identifying our core essence. By utilizing mental association techniques, such as memorizing enneagram types through visual cues, enhancing self-hypnosis with nonverbal hypnosis, and practicing clairvoyance in front of a mirror, we can increase our sensitivity and access our inner senses. And by using Indian self-hypnosis, we can realize our desires and connect with the universe at the three main zones of our body- the head, breast, and belly. With practice and consistency, we can create positive changes in our lives and let go of our fears and masks.
